Sub.Name: 1st Battalion
Sub.Description: Organize, train, and deploy multi-skilled IO teams worldwide in support of Army, Joint, and Interagency information operations and vulnerability assessment to provide supported commanders a unique advantage in the information environment.

Sub.Name: 2nd Battalion
Sub.Description: Plans, synchronizes, and conducts Army Computer Network Operations (CNO) through deployed CNO support teams and CNO reach back capabilities in order to gain and maintain information dominance throughout Cyberspace.

Sub.Name: 780th Military Intelligence Brigade
Sub.Description: The 780th Military Intelligence Brigade The 780th MI BDE conducts cyberspace operations to deliver effects in support of Army and Joint requirements. The 780th MI BDE is the only offensive cyberspace operations brigade in the U.S. Army and the organization actively fights alongside their partners to achieve U.S. supremacy in an increasingly contested cyberspace and electromagnetic spectrum.

Sub.Name: Company A
Sub.Description: Trained for insertion (V-22 Osprey, CH-53E Super Stallion)

Sub.Name: Company B
Sub.Description: Trained for insertion by Assault Amphibious Vehicle.

Sub.Name: Company C
Sub.Description: Trained for insertion by Assault Amphibious Vehicle

Sub.Name: U.S. Fleet Cyber Command – Tenth Fleet

Naval Cyber Warfare Development Group (Task Force 1090)
